front.title: IPv6 Application of the Alternate Marking Method

abstract.t: This document describes how the alternate marking method in [RFC8321] and [I-D.ietf-ippm-multipoint-alt-mark] can be used as the passive performance measurement method in an IPv6 domain and reports implementation considerations. It proposes how to define a new Extension Header Option to encode alternate marking technique and also considers the Segment Routing Header TLV alternative.
